channel.title: docker on Journal
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Journal

item.title: Vulnlab: Data
item.description: Overview Nmap Identifying Vulnerable Grafana Cracking Custom Hashes Abusing Docker to Elevate Privileges Overview Identify the vulnerable version of grafana Abuse the arbitrary file read to retrieve the database file Get password hash and salt to crack with hashcat to get user.txt sudo -l command shows that docker exec * can be run by boris Use it to run privileged commands on the running container Mount the host disk inside the container to get root flag Nmap --- vulnlabs/easy-data » nmap -sV 10.

item.title: Hack The Box: MonitorsTwo
item.description: Overview Nmap Exploiting CVE-2022-46169 Container Enumeration Cracking Hashes Enumeration as Marcus Checking Out What is Running Rooting Containers Getting Root Intended Enumeration Path Overview Exploit cacti version 1.2.22 to get a shell inside a docker container Enumerate internal files to acess the database and find a hash for the user marcus Crack the blowfish hash with hashcat Ssh in as marcus Abuse CVE-2021-41091 to get root shell Nmap danp@local:~/Documents/HackTheBox/MonitorsTwo|⇒ nmap -sV -sC 10.
